import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/components.css'; import brainImage from '../assets/brain_regions.png'; // You'll need to add this image function InterpretationViewer({ interpretationData }) { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('features'); const [selectedFeature, setSelectedFeature] = useState(null); const [showHelpModal, setShowHelpModal] = useState(false); if (!interpretationData) { return null; } const { region_descriptions, feature_explanations, event_descriptions } = interpretationData; // Sort features by region for better organization const sortedFeatures = Object.keys(feature_explanations || {}).sort((a, b) => { const regionA = a.split('_')[0]; const regionB = b.split('_')[0]; return regionA.localeCompare(regionB); }); return (

Results Interpretation

{activeTab === 'features' && (

Top Features

    {sortedFeatures.slice(0, 15).map(feature => (
  • setSelectedFeature(feature)} > {formatFeatureName(feature)}
    • ))}
{selectedFeature && (

{formatFeatureName(selectedFeature)}

Region: {capitalize(feature_explanations[selectedFeature].region)} lobe

Function: {feature_explanations[selectedFeature].region_function}

Measurement: {feature_explanations[selectedFeature].measure_description}

Wavelength: {feature_explanations[selectedFeature].wavelength_meaning}

Physiological meaning: Changes in blood oxygenation during cognitive/motor tasks

)}
)} {activeTab === 'events' && (

Event Descriptions

{Object.entries(event_descriptions || {}).map(([event, description]) => ( ))}
Event Label Description
{event} {description}
)} {activeTab === 'regions' && (

Brain Regions & Functions

{Object.entries(region_descriptions || {}).map(([region, details]) => ( ))}
Region Function Examples in Experiment
{capitalize(region)} {details.function} {details.examples}
)} {activeTab === 'processing' && (

Data Processing Information

✅ Preprocessing Steps Applied
  • Bandpass filtering (0.01-0.5 Hz)
  • Channel selection
  • Feature extraction
  • Feature selection using F-score
⚠️ Processing Limitations
  • No motion artifact correction was applied
  • Limited spatial resolution
  • Cross-validation with limited sample size
)}
{showHelpModal && (
setShowHelpModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

How to Read Feature Names

Feature names have the following structure:

region_wavelength_measure
  • region: Brain area (frontal, temporal, parietal)
  • wavelength: Light wavelength used (760nm or 850nm)
  • measure: Type of measurement extracted from the signal

Example: frontal_850_early_mean = Average signal in frontal region during early response phase, measuring oxygenated hemoglobin.

)}
); } function formatFeatureName(name) { return name .split('_') .map(word => capitalize(word)) .join(' '); } function capitalize(str) { return str.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + str.slice(1); } export default InterpretationViewer;
